content: **knitted head band with a cable in drops alpaca bouclé ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no ab-116 yarn group c ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s m l head-size 54/56 56/58 58/60 cm width approx 11 12 13 cm **materials** drops alpaca bouclé from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50-100-100 g colour 2020 light beige or use drops alpaca bouclé colour 0602 brown drops alpaca bouclé colour 0100 off white drops alpaca bouclé colour 5110 light grey drops alpaca bouclé colour 0517 grey needles drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm **knitting gauge** 19 stitches in width and 25 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
